verbose_text: This finding together with the frequency of NG2 / CSPG4 expression on plasmacytoid dendritic leukemia cell lines lacking MLL abnormalities and having the immunophenotype CD34 + / CD38 + / CD45 + / CD123 + / HLADR + XREF_BIBR have led investigators to draw an important conclusion : in the absence of MLL rearrangements, expression of the PG on leukemic cells may be dictated by the context within which leukemogenesis is initiated XREF_BIBR.
